meya mila mattamwala ha samahara illume sambandha nyayak lesa hadinwiya haka.mudale sansarana prawegaya sthawara anupathayaka pawathina wita,mudal sapayuma wadiwimath mulu wiyadam kirim wadiwimata hethu we.aarthikaya purna sewa niyukthi mattamaka pawathina wita bhanda ha sewa matha wiyadam wadiwima,mila mattama wadi wimata hethu we.mema mila mattama wadi wima akhandawa ha niranthara siduwana wita,ihatha dakwu nirwachanayata anuwa aarthikaya thula uddhamanayak pawathi.eenisa mudal sapayuma ihala yana pramanayak pasa uddhamanaya ihala yayi.mudal sapayusame pramanaya nawathuna wita uddhamanaya ihala yama nawathi.
